sentences.en: A friend in need is a friend in deed.
After the morning’s good deeds he deserved a rest.
sentences.cn: 上午做了好事之后，他理应休息一下。

sentences.en: Do you have the deed to the house?
sentences.cn: 你有这房子的契约 吗 ?

sentences.en: He did the good deed on his responsibility.
He is a good leader in deed as well as in name.
sentences.cn: 他是一位名副其实的好领袖.

sentences.en: He is faithful in word and deed.
He would be incapable of committing such a cruel deed.
sentences.cn: 他不会做出这么残忍的事.

sentences.en: Huang Jiguang's gallant deed is known by all men.
sentences.cn: 黄继光的英勇事迹尽人皆知.
谋杀是件非常丑恶的事.

sentences.en: None of us like the divorce of word and deed.
sentences.cn: 我们都不喜欢言行不一.

sentences.en: She tried to strangle her baby and her lover helped her finish the evil deed .
sentences.cn: 她试图掐死自己的宝宝，她的情人帮着完成了这个罪恶的勾当。

sentences.en: Smith changed his name by deed poll to Jervis-Smith.
sentences.cn: 史密斯通过单边契据将自己的名字更改为杰维斯&dash1;史密斯。

sentences.en: That foolish deed of his will remain a blot on his escutcheon.
sentences.cn: 他的那种愚蠢行为将永远是他名誉上的污点.

sentences.en: The money was given to us by deed of covenant.
sentences.cn: 这笔钱是根据契约书付给我们的.

sentences.en: The perpetrators of this evil deed must be brought to justice.
sentences.cn: 必须将参与这一恶行的凶手绳之以法。

sentences.en: This is the deed to John's plantation.
You are not going to fool me into such a deed.
sentences.cn: 你不要哄骗我去干那种事.

words.tran_cn: 文件箱；契据文书保险箱

phrases.tran_cn: v. 产生效果；付诸行动
信托书，委托书；信托契约

trans.tran_en: something someone does, especially something that is very good or very bad
